name: Ammo.*
text: This can be used by a related Loaded item. It is Consumed.

name: Animate vine
text: This counts as a monster with base stats of 8-average, +1 size, +5 combat, a Net attack, and Sessile and Unseeing. It's typically aggressive against anything nearby.

name: Aquatic
text: This thrives in water rather than on land. +5 to physical checks while in water, -10 while out.

name: Bleeding
text: (condition) Whenever you do a check or a check is done against you, take 1 point of injury. Resolved when you reach 5 injury. If you fall asleep, take all outstanding points immediately. (move) First aid: check MET+knowledge vs 15; on a pass, resolve this; on a fail, take 1 Injury.

name: Civilian
text: No mechanical effect, but it is assumed that player characters won't have much use for this.

name: Combat
text: This gives a numerical or other bonus to combat.

name: Concealed
text: You can easily hide this under your clothes.

name: Consumed
text: Single use.

name: Cornucopic
text: This produces a tremendous amount of food. Cornucopics are illegal under Hebai's Law.

name: Crit
text: This inflicts double damage. If multiple effects give crits, the effect adds, eg with two crits, an attack inflicts triple damage.

name: Dubious
text: I'm not convinced this content is really a good idea, at least in its current form, but I'll include it for now and playtest and revise.

name: Fight style
text: You may only have one boon with this; and that boon only applies if you have no Armour.

name: Incapacitated
text: (condition) You can't do anything. Lasts until end of battle.

name: Indirect
text: Enemies don't gain a combat bonus against you if they're behind cover.

name: Innocent
text: People won't necessarily take this as a threat.

name: Loaded.*
text: This can only operate by expending ammunition of the listed type.

name: Modifier
text: This ability may (optionally) be used in conjunction with an action to change its rules. You may stack arbitrarily many modifiers.

name: Move
text: This is an action that otherwise isn't available.

name: Net
text: On a hit against an opponent without Tangle, this inflicts Tangle n instead of n damage.

name: Prereq.*
text: You can't take this without the listed prerequisite. If you do somehow get it without the prerequisite, it doesn't take effect.

name: Ranged
text: This applies only when engaging from outside melee. You may have both a ranged and a non-ranged weapon equipped at once.

name: Sessile
text: This can't manoeuvre around the battlefield. It can still move eg to engage in combat, as opposed to something fully paralysed.

name: Sharp
text: When you incapacitate with this, the target takes Bleeding.

name: Slow
text: This can't be used during Crisis, the idea being that it takes a while and is at least a little fiddly.

name: Social
text: No mechanical effect, but if ever I create a social skill, this will be associated with it.

name: Stunned
text: (condition) Your action must be to stand ground. Resolved aeor.

name: Summon
text: This creates a new character. The spell isn't channelled, but you may have only one summon spell active at a time, so if you re-cast, the current one is cancelled and any summons are dismissed [from this dimension]. The summoner can give orders to the summon, but doesn't control it directly, and it can act of its own initiative. If this would be incapacitated, instead it is dismissed.

name: Suppress
text: When you win an engagement from range, you may prevent the opponent from closing to melee.

name: Thrown
text: As for Consumed, but can be retrieved after.

name: Trap
text: No mechanical effect, but this is often used as a trap.

name: .*Tribal.*
text: No mechanical effect, but it probably synergises with other effects with the same tribe.

name: Two-handed
text: If you fight with this, you can't use anything in your off hand.

name: Unseeing
text: This doesn't use vision for perception. It doesn't generally suffer any combat penalties, but can't do things such as read or see colour.

name: Veil
text: A magical effect that interferes with others' perception of an object or area. By default, a veiled person is hidden with +5 to hide checks.

name: World-building
text: This content exists for world-building purposes, but is not available to players.

name: Worn.*
text: This is worn on the listed location. You can only have one item worn there.

name: Armour
text: Take +n to combat, -n to athletics, and -n to stealth.

name: Armour piercing
text: Take +n to combat up to a maximum of the target's total Armour value.

name: Fatigue
text: (condition) Take -$n to all physical actions. Remove aeob. At 10 fatigue, you are Incapacitated.

name: Injury
text: (condition) Take -$n to all physical actions. Decrease by 1 with each long rest.

name: Tangle
text: (condition) Take -$n to all physical actions. You can't manoeuvre. You have Untangle (move): if engaged this round, you don't inflict damage on a win, and if you win all engagements, resolve this condition. Lasts 3 rounds.
